name: "10 Second" Astronaut
description:
A short-ish game about an astronaut running out of oxygen. Game was created as part of a "game-a-fortnight" uni project :D.

*the sound I used for the laptop turning on is from Ubisoft's Splinter Cell Chaos Theory*

I don't intend to sell this game, it's just for a personal project.

**unsure why certain text don't disappear when they're supposed to on Mac**
